activities: Drilling Info Holdings, Inc. is a global information/database company operating in the oil and gas industry.  Holdings, through various subsidiaries, employs and does business in a number of countries, including several within the European Union (e.g., U.K., Switzerland, etc.).  As part of Holdings' international operations, the Company has implemented a comprehensive Anti-Corruption Program to comply with the U.S. Foreign Corrupt Practices Act, U.K. Bribery Act of 2010 and similar laws enacted by other jurisdictions.  Holdings intends to centralize management and operation of this program at its corporate headquarters in Austin.  This will require Holdings to maintain files on various EU vendors and personnel that come within the purview of EU privacy laws.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
